title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, it results in N redraws of the entire client area.
OB: The problem occurs when appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode. It causes inefficient redraws of the entire client area.
EB: No explicit expected behavior was provided.
SR: To see the redraws occurring, add the following line to StyledText's performPaint() method: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
